item.title: [ToDo] [MAS S67] The Great Problems
item.description: The Great Problems. Kevin M. Esvelt; Rosalind Picard; Neil Buddy Shah; Amy Smith; Anne White; Kai Steinmetz; David Keith; Toby Ord; Megan Palmer. MIT. canvas.mit.edu . 2021. Introduction: Triumphs and Tragedies Great Problem: Mental Health Finland is the happiest country in the world, and the Finns aren’t happy about it. Burden of Depressive Disorders by Country, Sex, Age and Year Development, Freedom, and Rising Happines: A Global Perspective (1981 - 2007) How to Be Happy A Nihilist’s Guide to Meaning How Bad Are Things?
